atlantis.helpers.json¶

:mod:atlantis.helper.json provides helper functions and interfaces for loading and reading game objects from and into json files.

json_dump_list()¶

atlantis.helpers.json.json_dump_list(file, object_list)¶

Save a list of JsonSerializable objects into a file.

This function saves a list of JsonSerializable objects as json into the file-like object give as its first parameter.

If objects in object_list doesn’t implement JsonSerializable interface json_dump_list() tries to dump the object directly, raising TypeError if not possible.

Parameters:
  • file – file-like object where the json will be saved into.
  • object_list – list of objects implementing JsonSerializable interface.
Raises:
  • NotImplementedError – if JsonSerializable.json_serialize() is not implemented.
  • TypeError – if elements in object_list are not serializable nor implement JsonSerializable interface.

json_load_list()¶

atlantis.helpers.json.json_load_list(file, serializable_class=None)¶

Load a list of objects from a json file.

This function loads a list of objects from a json file. The objects can be primitive objects serializable by json.dump(), in which case deserialize_func will be None, or can be a instance of JsonSerializable interface, in which case objects will be build from json data calling JsonSerializable.json_deserialize() on the target class.

Parameters:
  • file – file-like object where json data will be read from.
  • serializable_class – class of the objects in the list. Must implement JsonSerializable interface.
Returns:

the list of objects
Raises:
  • NotImplementedError – if JsonSerializable.json_deserialize() is not overriden.
  • TypeError – if serializable_class does not implements JsonSerializable.

JsonSerializable¶

class atlantis.helpers.json.JsonSerializable¶

Interface for objects serializable into a json file.

This object defines the public methods that have to be overriden by classes implementing JsonSerializable interface.

static json_deserialize(json_object)¶

Load object from a deserialized json object.

This method should load object from data returned by json.load().

Parameters:json_object – object returned by json.load().
Returns:the JsonSerializable object from json data.
Raises NotImplementedError:
 if not overriden.
json_serialize()¶

Return a serializable version of current object.

Returned object should be serializable by json.dump()

Returns:Serializable object.
Raises NotImplementedError:
 if not overriden.
